structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Application for licensure as elevator contractor -- Contents -- Eligibility requirements.

text.section:
An applicant for an elevator contractor license shall:
Employ at least one (1) licensed elevator mechanic who performs the work described in KRS 198B.4003; and
Have proof of compliance with insurance requirements of KRS 198B.4027.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 5, effective July 1, 2011.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/1/2011). A reference to the "office" of housing, buildings and construction in this section, as created by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 5, has been changed in codification to the "department" of housing, buildings and construction to reflect the reorganization of certain parts of the Executive Branch, as set forth in Executive Order 2009-535 and confirmed by the General Assembly in 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24. This change was made by the Reviser of Statutes pursuant to 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1938.
